text: There will be one law for the native and for the alien residing among you.
Then Trypho sent soldiers and cavalry to Galilee and the Great Plain to destroy all Jonathan's men.
And stretching out his hand toward his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers.
“I have come to set the earth on fire, and how I wish it were already blazing!
because I did not speak on my own, but the Father who sent me commanded me what to say and speak.
